channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 00:25 Flowing anxiety in the Cherkasy region. Find out, the alarm is still in:- Cherkasy district- Zolotonsky district
item.description: 🟡 00:25 Flowing anxiety in the Cherkasy region. Find out, the alarm is still in:- Cherkasy district- Zolotonsky district#Cherkasy_ This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
